DocAttribute.Name: CombustionTemperature
DocAttribute.Documentation: Combustion temperature of the material when air is at 298 K and 100 kPa.

DocAttribute.Name: CarbonContent
DocAttribute.Documentation: The carbon content in the fuel. This is measured in weight of carbon per unit weight of fuel and is therefore unitless.

DocAttribute.Name: LowerHeatingValue
DocAttribute.Documentation: Lower Heating Value is defined as the amount of energy released (MJ/kg) when a fuel is burned completely, and H2O is in vapor form in the combustion products.

DocAttribute.Name: HigherHeatingValue
DocAttribute.Documentation: Higher Heating Value is defined as the amount of energy released (MJ/kg) when a fuel is burned completely, and H2O is in liquid form in the combustion products.
